Reviews.Title: “If you want better - then pay for it”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 13 nights decent authority staying single basic negatives satelite tv none tv 5 terrestrial channels tiny ensuite literally ive seen technically shower toilet sink counts fire alarms twice hours faults system safe wasnt happy breakfast awful awful days stopped bread cornflakes milk left ages warm positives value £50 night centre london amazing value 5 star title youre pay staff friendly happy help whenever free wifi tin fuss internet didnt cost stray train noise railway station noise wasnt bad otherside hotel maybe whos worse window wide youre light sleeper ear plugs shout im pretty sleeper didnt notice wasnt bad simple served purpose 5 star hotel means location perfect cheap stay london perfectly reasonable hotel accounts food eventually day youre 200 yards victoria shopping centre plenty food
